metadata.title: USN-5404-2 -- Rsyslog vulnerability
metadata.description: USN-5404-1 addressed a vulnerability in Rsyslog. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 16.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:  Pieter Agten discovered that Rsyslog incorrectly handled certain requests. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a crash.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5404-2` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  rsyslog-pgsql - 8.16.0-1ubuntu3.1+esm2 rsyslog-gssapi - 8.16.0-1ubuntu3.1+esm2 rsyslog-mysql - 8.16.0-1ubuntu3.1+esm2 rsyslog-relp - 8.16.0-1ubuntu3.1+esm2 rsyslog - 8.16.0-1ubuntu3.1+esm2 rsyslog-elasticsearch - 8.16.0-1ubuntu3.1+esm2 rsyslog-gnutls - 8.16.0-1ubuntu3.1+esm2 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
